text: My daughter did her Math with A Grader Bedok branch. The materials given were very good for her development. Teachers and administrators were helpful with going the extra miles to explain her weakness and print additional papers for her to do!

A grader Learning centre is really good for my son learning to improve his maths. After we try first tuition my son is happy with that. The teacher there really good and they also give my son rewards after lesson to encourage my son if he do correctly on the mathsüëçüëç

In just a span of 2 months, AGrader has helped my daughter a lot.  Special mention to Ms Jocelyn who helped her understand how to tackle Science questions better.  I was told her classmates there are also friendly and witty which made the classes more interactive and fun.

My son enjoys his Maths classes at Agrader. He looks forward for his weekly class. Teachers and staffs are very friendly and keep checking on their work. They are willing to go extra mile to help my son by printing extra worksheets to do it at home:))

My son attends English, Maths and Science classes at Agrader Bedok and is enjoying his lessons. He particularly loves the Science tutor, Mr Shawn and is intrigued by his teaching methods which  makes learning science enjoyable for him.
